name: Adobe Lightroom Module
summary: Learn about .LRMODULE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In macOS, LRMODULE files are stored in Lightroom's PlugIns directory. In Windows, they are stored in Lightroom's Adobe Lightroom CC directory.
Version 5 of Lightroom contains the following LRMODULE files:

description: An LRMODULE file is a module used by Adobe Lightroom, a professional photo editing and organization application, or Lightroom Classic. Each LRMODULE file contains data used to load one or more Lightroom features, such as the ability to import and export photos. LRMODULE files are not meant to be manually opened by users.

instructions: LRMODULE files are not meant to be opened. To access the feature(s) an LRMODULE file contains, open Adobe Lightroom or Adobe Lightroom Classic and use that feature.
